1604065021_mirrored_ghost_github.body: Or you can use proxifier, and set your proxy to 127.0.0.1:9150

1604065972_mirrored_jarodlee_github.body: issue is still present, tried with curl and python's request function, had some websocket related issue (this browser does not seem to support websockets)

topic.title: PHP Support
topic.body:
Can you add PHP to ZeroNet sites?

Thanks.

(Functioning PHP.)

Or does that have to be added on my side?
